sen.e: March 11: He declared himself as the Toshi choja (chieftain of the Fujiwara family).
March 11: Declared himself Toshi choja (chieftain of the Fujiwara family).

sen.cmt: On 日付～、の表現にしました。

sen.j: 座列、従一位行左大臣源俊房の次列。
sen.e: He sat in line with MINAMOTO no Toshifusa with titles of Juichi rank (Junior First Rank) Sa-daijin (a chief of an Imperial Japanese Council of State, left division).
Sat in line with MINAMOTO no Toshifusa with titles of Juichi rank (Junior First Rank) Sa-daijin (a chief of an Imperial Japanese Council of State, left division).
Sat in line with MINAMOTO no Toshifusa with titles of Juichii (Junior First Rank) Sadaijin (minister of the left).
sen.cmt: 左大臣→Sadaijin (minister of the left) としました。

sen.j: 一座宣下無し。
sen.e: There was no Ichiza-senge (imperial proclamation of the highest rank).
There was no Ichiza-senge (imperial proclamation of the highest rank).
Senge was not issued appointing him as Ichiza (the highest rank).

sen.j: 1096年（嘉保3年）1月5日、従一位に昇叙。
sen.e: January 5, 1096: He went through shojo to the Juichi Rank (Junior First Rank).
January 5, 1096: Shojo to the Juichi Rank (Junior First Rank).

sen.j: 1月、一座宣下。

There was no Ichiza-senge in January.

sen.j: 1099年（承徳3年）6月28日、薨去。
sen.e: He passed away on June 28, 1099 (July 18, 1099 in a modern calendar).
Minowara passed away on June 28, 1099 (July 18, 1099 in the modern calendar).
On June 28, 1099 (July 18, 1099 in the modern calendar), Moromichi passed away.
